content.text: is designed to archive data from current upload tables to archive tables within the

schema. It handles three main types of data: account billing details, meter read details, and payment details. The procedure first checks if there are existing records for the specified billing period in the archive tables and raises an error if such records exist. If no records exist, it proceeds to insert data from the current upload tables into the corresponding archive tables. Additionally, it updates certain fields in the archive meter read details table based on conditions from the current upload meter read details.

The procedure involves multiple steps, including conditional checks, data insertion, and updates across several tables. While the logic is straightforward, the number of operations and the potential volume of data being processed contribute to a medium complexity level.
: Represents the billing period for which data is being archived. It is used to filter records in both the conditional checks and data operations.
: Represents the ID of the authenticated user performing the operation. This is used in the data insertion to track who performed the operation.
: An output parameter intended to return the status of the operation, although it is not explicitly set within the procedure.
: The procedure checks if there are existing records for the specified billing period in the
tables. If records exist, it raises an error and exits.

: The procedure may handle large volumes of data, especially if the upload tables contain many records for the specified billing period. This could impact performance during the insert and update operations.
: Ensuring that the relevant columns, especially those used in joins and where clauses, are indexed can improve performance.
: The procedure does not explicitly manage transactions, which could lead to partial updates if an error occurs after some operations have been completed.
: The procedure raises errors if records exist for the billing period in the archive tables, but it does not handle other potential errors that could occur during data insertion or updates.
: If multiple instances of this procedure are executed simultaneously for the same billing period, it could lead to race conditions or data integrity issues.
output parameter is not utilized within the procedure, which may lead to confusion or incomplete status reporting.
: Without explicit transaction management, there is a risk of data inconsistency if the procedure is interrupted or fails partway through execution.

CREATE PROCEDURE [CrisNationalGridWest].[usp_CRIS_ArchiveUploadData]
(
	@BillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6),
	@authenticatedID AS INT,
	@StatusCode AS INT  OUTPUT
)  
 AS 
 BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
				
	-- check if there is any current periods records		
	IF (EXISTS(SELECT ARCHIVEUploadAccountBillingDetailSeqid FROM CrisNationalGridWest.ARCHIVEUploadAccountBillingDetail WHERE BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod))
	BEGIN
		RAISERROR ('The Archive account table has data for the current period. Please verify. ', 12, 1);
		RETURN;
	END;

	IF (EXISTS(SELECT ARCHIVEUploadMeterReadDetailSeqid FROM CrisNationalGridWest.ARCHIVEUploadMeterReadDetail WHERE BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod))
	BEGIN
		RAISERROR ('The Archive meter table has data for the current period. Please verify. ', 12, 1);
		RETURN;
	END;

	-- account level details
	INSERT INTO CrisNationalGridWest.ARCHIVEUploadAccountBillingDetail
		(UploadAccountBillingDetailSeqid
		,UtilityCompanySeqid
		,AccountInvoiceBillingGroup
		,BillingPeriod
		,BillingPeriodRevision
		,CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision
		,FirstBillingPeriodCanceled
		,FirstNewCRISBillingPeriodRevision
		,IsSpannedBilling
		,NumberOfBillingPeriod
		,IsCurrentPeriodExchange
		,AccountNumber
		,MeterReadWorkDay
		,UtilityServiceAccountName
		,UtilityServiceAddress
		,Borough
		,Zipcode
		,[State]
		,ActivityCode
		,ActivityDate
		,ActivityTime
		,ActivityDateTime
		,TransactionCode
		,SpecialLedgerAccountNUmber
		,SpecialLedgerWorkDay
		,GasRateCode
		,BillFrequency
		,EstimatedOrActualBillingCode
		,GasChargeAmount
		,BillingFromDate
		,BillingToDate
		,BillRenderDate
		,BillingDays
		,BilledCCF
		,ThermFactor
		,BilledTherms
		,NumberOfMeters
		,BillType
		,CommodityChargeAmount
		,DeliveryChargeAmount
		,MTACommodityTax
		,MTADeliveryTax
		,SalesTax
		,SystemBenefitsCharge
		,RetailDecouplingMechanismCharge
		,DeliveryRateSurcharge
		,RealTimeNormalizationCharge
		,LatePaymentCharge
		,PaperBillCharge
		,CommodityCostFactor
		,MTACommodityFactor
		,MTADeliveryFactor
		,SalesTaxFactor
		,SystemBenefitChargeFactor
		,RetailDecouplingMechanismFactor
		,DeliveryRateSurchargeFactor
		,RealTimeNormalizationFactor
		,LatePaymentFactor
		,CurrentAccountBalance
		,AccountArrears
		,TerminationBalance
		,TotalPaymentsPosted
		,DateLastPayment
		,MiscellaneousChargeAmount
		,MiscellaneousChargeType
		,ExcludeAndReview
		,FireAuditTrigger
		,Notes
		,AuthenticatedUserID
		,DateAdded
		,LastUpdate
		,IsCancelForCurrentTransaction, 
		IsCancelForPreviousTransaction, IsTransactionCancelFound, IsPartialCancelattionFromPriorPeriodMergedBilling, 
		IsPartialRebillFromPriorPeriodMergedBilling, ExcludeReason)		    
	SELECT UploadAccountBillingDetailSeqid, UtilityCompanySeqid, AccountInvoiceBillingGroup, BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, 
        CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision, FirstBillingPeriodCanceled, FirstNewCRISBillingPeriodRevision, IsSpannedBilling, NumberOfBillingPeriod, 
        IsCurrentPeriodExchange, AccountNumber, MeterReadWorkDay, UtilityServiceAccountName, UtilityServiceAddress, Borough, Zipcode, State, 
        ActivityCode, ActivityDate, ActivityTime, ActivityDateTime, TransactionCode, SpecialLedgerAccountNUmber, SpecialLedgerWorkDay, GasRateCode, 
        BillFrequency, EstimatedOrActualBillingCode, GasChargeAmount, BillingFromDate, BillingToDate, BillRenderDate, BillingDays, BilledCCF, 
        ThermFactor, BilledTherms, NumberOfMeters, BillType, CommodityChargeAmount, DeliveryChargeAmount, MTACommodityTax, MTADeliveryTax, 
        SalesTax, SystemBenefitsCharge, RetailDecouplingMechanismCharge, DeliveryRateSurcharge, RealTimeNormalizationCharge, LatePaymentCharge, 
        PaperBillCharge, CommodityCostFactor, MTACommodityFactor, MTADeliveryFactor, SalesTaxFactor, SystemBenefitChargeFactor, 
        RetailDecouplingMechanismFactor, DeliveryRateSurchargeFactor, RealTimeNormalizationFactor, LatePaymentFactor, CurrentAccountBalance, 
        AccountArrears, TerminationBalance, TotalPaymentsPosted, DateLastPayment, MiscellaneousChargeAmount, MiscellaneousChargeType, 
        ExcludeAndReview, FireAuditTrigger, Notes, AuthenticatedUserID, DateAdded, LastUpdate, IsCancelForCurrentTransaction, 
        IsCancelForPreviousTransaction, IsTransactionCancelFound, IsPartialCancelattionFromPriorPeriodMergedBilling, 
        IsPartialRebillFromPriorPeriodMergedBilling, ExcludeReason
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail;

	--- meter level details
	INSERT INTO CrisNationalGridWest.ARCHIVEUploadMeterReadDetail
		(UploadMeterReadDetailSeqid
		,UtilityCompanySeqid
		,AccountInvoiceBillingGroup
		,BillingPeriod
		,BillingPeriodRevision
		,CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision
		,FirstBillingPeriodCanceled
		,AccountNumber
		,MeterReadWorkDay
		,UtilityServiceAccountName
		,UtilityServiceAddress
		,Borough
		,Zipcode
		,[State]
		,ActivityCode
		,ActivityDate
		,ActivityTime
		,ActivityDateTime
		,TransactionCode
		,SpecialLedgerAccountNumber
		,SpecialLedgerWorkDay
		,MeterNumber
		,CurrentMeterNumber
		,MeterConstant
		,NumberOfDials
		,MeterReadType
		,EstimatedOrActual
		,BillingTransactionCode
		,MeterReadStatus
		,MeterReadSource
		,MeterReadReason
		,MeterType
		,MeterReadingFromDate
		,MeterReadingToDate
		,MeterFromReading
		,MeterToReading
		,MeterReadTime
		,MeterCCF
		,Therms
		,ThermsFactor
		,GasRateCode
		,FixFactor
		,PartSupplied
		,HasMeterRolledOver
		,MeterCorrectorId
		,IsCancel
		,IsProcessed
		,ExcludeAndReview
		,FireAuditTrigger
		,Notes
		,AuthenticatedUserID
		,DateAdded
		,LastUpdate)
	SELECT UploadMeterReadDetailSeqid
		,UtilityCompanySeqid
		,AccountInvoiceBillingGroup
		,BillingPeriod
		,BillingPeriodRevision
		,CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision
		,FirstBillingPeriodCanceled
		,AccountNumber
		,MeterReadWorkDay
		,UtilityServiceAccountName
		,UtilityServiceAddress
		,Borough
		,Zipcode
		,[State]
		,ActivityCode
		,ActivityDate
		,ActivityTime
		,ActivityDateTime
		,TransactionCode
		,SpecialLedgerAccountNumber
		,SpecialLedgerWorkDay
		,MeterNumber
		,CurrentMeterNumber
		,MeterConstant
		,NumberOfDials
		,MeterReadType
		,EstimatedOrActual
		,BillingTransactionCode
		,MeterReadStatus
		,MeterReadSource
		,MeterReadReason
		,MeterType
		,MeterReadingFromDate
		,MeterReadingToDate
		,MeterFromReading
		,MeterToReading
		,MeterReadTime
		,MeterCCF
		,Therms
		,ThermsFactor
		,GasRateCode
		,FixFactor
		,PartSupplied
		,HasMeterRolledOver
		,MeterCorrectorId
		,IsCancel
		,IsProcessed
		,ExcludeAndReview
		,FireAuditTrigger
		,Notes
		,AuthenticatedUserID
		,DateAdded
		,LastUpdate
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadMeterReadDetail;

	-- update the ARCHIVE back
	UPDATE AMRD
	SET ExcludeTest = UMRD.ExcludeTest
		,ExclusionNotes = UMRD.ExcludeReason
		,IsCancelled = CASE WHEN UMRD.IsTransactionCancelFound  = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
		,BPCancelled = CASE WHEN UMRD.IsTransactionCancelFound = 'Y' THEN UMRD.BillingPeriod ELSE NULL END
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.ARCHIVEUploadMeterReadDetail AS AMRD
		INNER JOIN CrisNationalGridWest.UploadMeterReadDetail AS UMRD ON AMRD.UploadMeterReadDetailSeqid = UMRD.UploadMeterReadDetailSeqid AND AMRD.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod;

	-- Payment Detail section
	INSERT CrisNationalGridWest.ARCHIVEUploadPaymentDetail
		(UtilityCompanySeqid,
		AccountInvoiceBillingGroup,
		BillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriodRevision,
		PaymentBillingPeriod,
		AccountNumber,
		MeterReadWorkDay,
		UtilityServiceAccountName,
		UtilityServiceAddress,
		Borough,
		ZipCode,
		[State],
		ActivityCode,
		ActivityDate,
		ActivityTime,
		ActivityDateTime,
		TransactionCode,
		SLAccountNUmber,
		AccountStatus,
		PaymentAmount,
		PaymentDate,
		CurrentAccountBalance,
		AcountArrears,
		TerminationBalance,
		OldCurrentAccountBalance,
		OldAcountArrears,
		OldTerminationBalance,
		MiscellaneousCreditAmount,
		MiscellaneousCreditType,
		GasRateCode,
		Notes,
		AuthenticatedUserID,
		DateAdded,
		LastUpdate)
	SELECT
		UtilityCompanySeqid,
		AccountInvoiceBillingGroup,
		BillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriodRevision,
		PaymentBillingPeriod,
		AccountNumber,
		MeterReadWorkDay,
		UtilityServiceAccountName,
		UtilityServiceAddress,
		Borough,
		ZipCode,
		[State],
		ActivityCode,
		ActivityDate,
		ActivityTime,
		ActivityDateTime,
		TransactionCode,
		SLAccountNUmber,
		AccountStatus,
		PaymentAmount,
		PaymentDate,
		CurrentAccountBalance,
		AcountArrears,
		TerminationBalance,
		OldCurrentAccountBalance,
		OldAcountArrears,
		OldTerminationBalance,
		MiscellaneousCreditAmount,
		MiscellaneousCreditType,
		GasRateCode,
		Notes,
		AuthenticatedUserID,
		DateAdded,
		LastUpdate 
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadPaymentDetail;
END;
